column1: The '''Elves of Eressëa''' were the [[Elves]] who dwelt on the island of [[Tol Eressëa]] in the [[Bay of Eldamar]]. The [[Vanyar]] and the [[Noldor]] were taken to [[Aman]] on that island
column2: but the first Elves to remain there for any time were the [[Teleri]]
column3: who lived on the island long after it was anchored off the coasts of [[Aman]]. After a while
column6: to dwell on the strands of the [[Blessed Realm]] itself
column7: and especially at the haven of [[Alqualondë]].

column1: After the [[War of Wrath]] at the end of the [[First Age]]
column2: [[Tol Eressëa]] was again peopled with Elves
column3: by the exiles returning from [[Middle-earth]] who settled there. Their shoreland city was at [[Avallónë]]
column4: and they built up a great friendship with the [[Númenóreans]]
column5: at least during the early part of the [[Second Age]].
